wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Brook (27 July 1918 – 1996) was a professional footballer who played as a defender for Halifax Town, Huddersfield Town & Oldham Athletic. He grew up in Northowram, near Halifax in the West Riding of Yorkshire.

link_mentions.page: List of rivers of New Jersey

response: Lewis Brook is a tributary of the Stony Brook in Mercer County, New Jersey in the United States.
Lewis Brook starts at , near the Pennington Shopping Center. It flows eastward, crossing North Main Street, before draining into the Stony Brook at .
